about_the_game:
Experience the full scope of Iraq's diverse and historically rich environment with DCS: Iraq. Fly over the entire country, from the deserts of the south to the mountains of the north, and immerse yourself in a landscape that has been the backdrop for some of the most significant air campaigns in history.

With exclusive high-quality ground objects and textures, DCS: Iraq offers unparalleled realism and detail. Engage in extensive missions and campaigns that cover various historical periods, and take advantage of the enhanced environmental effects that bring the region to life like never before.

Key Features

  • Complete Iraq Map: Covering the entire country, including major cities and geographical features.

  • High-Quality Ground Objects and Textures: Enhanced models and textures for buildings, vehicles, and environmental elements, available only in this full module.

  • Authentic Air Bases Nationwide: Accurate recreations of all significant airfields and military installations.

  • Diverse Landscapes: From deserts and marshlands to mountains and urban centres, experience the full geographic diversity of Iraq.

  • Extensive Mission Content: A wide array of single-player and multiplayer missions and campaigns spanning different eras and conflicts.

  • Full Aircraft Compatibility: Compatible with all existing DCS World aircraft modules.

  • Enhanced Environmental Effects: Advanced weather systems, dynamic lighting, and atmospheric effects for maximum immersion.

Early Access Features

  • Complete Map: Access to the full Iraqi terrain with essential features.

  • Ground Objects: Exclusive detailed models and textures for an immersive ground experience.

  • Functional Airbases: Operational facilities across the country with accurate layouts.

  • Initial Mission Set: A selection of single-player missions covering a range of scenarios.

  • Multiplayer Support: Full integration with DCS multiplayer for expansive cooperative and competitive play.

Features Coming During Early Access

  • Terrain Refinements: Ongoing enhancements to terrain details and environmental elements.

  • Expanded Landmarks: Addition of more cultural, historical, and strategic sites across Iraq.

  • Mission and Campaign Expansion: Development of additional missions and campaigns, including historical and hypothetical scenarios.

  • AI and Ground Unit Enhancements: Improved AI behaviours and interactions, along with ground unit model updates.

  • Performance Optimisations: Regular updates for bug fixes, performance improvements, and new features based on community feedback.

  • Future Regional Expansions: Planned extensions into neighbouring regions, further broadening the operational theatre.

name: DCS: Iraq

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 4+ cores
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • DLC size: 75.5GB
  • Input: Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 8+ cores
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • DLC size: 75.5GB
  • Input: Joystick / Throttle / Pedals / VR

short_description: Experience the full scope of Iraq's diverse and historically rich environment with DCS: Iraq.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Czech, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
